help-file.title: BLACKSMITH
help-file.content:
A more subdued and less violent subclass of the alchemist the blacksmith excels in crafting and forging, finding more enjoyment searching the land for various ores and minerals then engaging in warfare like his counter-part.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 41st level: Forge 41st level: Smelting (Smelt)
Innates/Passive Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Miner's Sight 41st level: Foundry
